subject: Golf
Doping (Sports)
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: A week after a doping case against him was dropped, Vijay Singh sued the PGA Tour, saying the its mishandling of his doping case had caused him severe emotional distress.
snippet: A week after a doping case against him was dropped, Vijay Singh sued the PGA Tour, saying the its mishandling of his doping case had caused him severe emotional distress.
